main.name: Taylor Dragoo
main.description: With a passion for web applications, UX and sound design
main.bio: I graduated from the University of Central Oklahoma in 2013 with a Bachelor of Applied Technology in Sound Design. After graduating, I spent the following three years as a sound editor and designer on multiple feature-length films that went on to be showcased on Netflix and at Comic-Con International.
main.bio2: I took the knowledge gained from being a sound editor and decided to pursue a second Bachelorâ€™s degree, After looking at different programs, I began the Bachelor of Science in Computer Science program online at Fort Hays State University.
main.bio3: Prior to starting my Computer Science degree I had begun my career as an IT Support Analyst at the University of Oklahoma Health Sciences Center which is where I still currently reside.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

work.title: University of Oklahoma
work.description1: Provide a positive customer-focused service in a high-volume environment while meeting service level agreement standards.
work.description2: Led the team in calls and ticket resolutions over the course of 2020, as we experienced a 40% increase in desktop support tickets from the year prior.
work.description4: Technology Used: Active Directory, Exchange Management Console, Dell Encryption Enterprise, PowerShell, VMWare.
work.description3: Managed user accounts and access in Microsoft Active Directory, Exchange Management Console and Office365 Cloud Exchange Management Console.

work.title: Audio Engineer and Consultant
work.description1: Audio Post-Production Engineer involved with multiple feature-length films that went on to be showcased on Netflix, Comic-Con International, and Theatres throughout the country.
work.description2: Technology: Avid Pro Tools, Ableton, Soundminer, Universal Audio, SoundToys

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
